summary: A Montreal high school student who believes he is the reincarnation of Leon Trotsky starts a revolution against apathy among his fellow students.
cast: Liane Balaban|Jay Baruchel|Taylor Baruchel|Dan Beirne|Domini Blythe|Jonathan Bosco|Hélène Bourgeois Leclerc|Justin Bradley|Geneviève Bujold|Anne-Marie Cadieux|Jesse Camacho|Cecile Cristobal|Darren Curtis|Paul Doucet|Guy Dufaux|Colm Feore|Angela Galuppo|Kyle Gatehouse|Alain Goulem|Dan Haber|Emily Hampshire|Trevor Hayes|David Julian Hirsh|Kaniehtiio Horn|Pat Kiely|Sarah-Jeanne Labrosse|Ricky Mabe|Linda Malo|Michael Murphy|Jessica Paré|Tommie-Amber Pirie|Jesse Rath|Erika Rosenbaum|Saul Rubinek|Paul Spence|Jacob Tierney|Kevin Tierney|Jacklin Webb|Troy Michael Claymore|Mary L. Milne|Ben Mulroney|Anthony Ecclissi|Li Li|Cara Reynolds|Jesse Vinet
title: The Trotsky
